  -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  border: none;
  background-color: white;
  -webkit-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in, border-color 0.2s ease-in, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0, 0, 0;
  -moz-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
  -o-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;

}

<div class="c-hero" style="background-image: url('http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/responsive-pages/hero-riot-rumble.jpg')">

    <header class="c-hero__header">

    <h1 class="c-hero__title">Definitely <span class="c-hero__title-emphasis">(Not)</span> Rivals</h1>

</header>

</div>

<div class="o-container">

    <div class="c-video c-video--hero">
    <div class="o-aspect o-aspect--video">
        <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/N44R8c_F2lI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
    </div>
</div>

            <section class="c-content-module u-text-center">

            
            <p class="c-content-module__text">
                Rioters compete in an internal League of Legends tournament called the Riot Rumble for glory, bragging rights, and a truly sick jacket. After years of fierce battles on the Rift, storied rivalries emerged in every bracket, Bronze to Diamond. In this short documentary, we pull back the curtain on the Riot Rumble, and two teams destined to clash in an epic showdown, because whatever else they are, they’re definitely (not) rivals.            </p>

        </section>
    
</div>

<div class="u-bg-grey">

    <div class="o-container">

        <section class="c-content-module u-text-center">

            <header class="c-matchup-header">

                <div class="c-matchup-header__block">
                    <h2 class="c-matchup-header__title">Finance</h2>
                </div>
                <div class="c-matchup-header__block">
                    <span class="c-matchup-header__vs">VS.</span>

                    <h2 class="c-matchup-header__title">Esports</h2>
                </div>

            </header>

            <div class="c-matchup">

                <div class="c-matchup__block">

                    <div class="c-matchup-entry c-matchup-entry--blue-team">

                        <div class="c-matchup-entry__block">
                            <h3 class="c-matchup-entry__name">HodgPodg</h3>
                            <ul class="c-matchup-entry__list">
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Team:</span> Ramrod (Finance)
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Practice:</span> Twice a day
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Role:</span> Jungle
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Champs:</span> Amumu, Rek'Sai, Gragas, Nautilus
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Skins:</span> "Faker and I don't use skins"
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>

                        <div class="c-matchup-entry__block">
                            <div class="c-matchup-entry__img-wrapper">
                                <img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/all/themes/riot/media/images/riot-rumble/profiles/hodgpodg.jpg" class="c-matchup-entry__img" alt="">
                            </div>
                        </div>

                    </div>

                </div>

                <div class="c-matchup__block">

                    <div class="c-matchup-entry c-matchup-entry--red-team">

                        <div class="c-matchup-entry__block">
                            <h3 class="c-matchup-entry__name">Magus</h3>
                            <ul class="c-matchup-entry__list">
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Team:</span> Rocket (Esports)
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Practice:</span> "Like you play. All try-hard all the time."
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Role:</span> Mid
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Nicknames:</span> Every mispronunciation of Magus possible
                                </li>
                                <li class="c-matchup-entry__item">
                                    <span class="c-matchup-entry__label">Champs:</span> Anivia, Ahri, and Veigar
